author: Omkar Godbole
title: BlackRock's Spot Bitcoin ETF Snaps Four-Week Downtrend in Volumes
description: IBIT saw a net inflow of $1.31 billion last week, contributing to a total of $3.74 billion in investor funds this month.
content:
BlackRock's spot bitcoin 
 exchange-traded fund (ETF) listed on Nasdaq under the ticker IBIT rose 3.49% last week, snapping a four-week downtrend in trading volumes.A total of 210.02 million shares … [+988 chars]
